description: Noir is a black cat owned by the Kirishima twins. She received less attention (from http://anidb.net/ch11092 [Keizou]) once http://anidb.net/ch10899 [Tama] was adopted into the family, and was jealous of his near-royal treatment as a rare breed. Still, the two share a fondness for one another, but easily become argumentative.
name: Noir
